contents: Article 13 (Office Management) ① Documents sent externally by the Korean Committee are sent in the name of the Chairman, and documents sent externally by the City/Provincial Committee are sent in the name of the Chairman of the City/Provincial Committee. However, documents processed electronically may be executed in the name of the head of the organization where the secretariat is established. ② Documents belonging to evidentiary documents, such as certificates of merit or letters of appointment, must be accompanied by a special person of the Chairman of the Korean Committee as defined in the Corporation's Office Management Rules and in the name of the head of the organization where the Secretariat is established. The special seal of the designated city/provincial committee is stamped., ③ The document classification symbol and recipient symbol for each city/provincial committee are as shown in Table 2, and the type and standard of the seal, its purpose and management, and the person responsible for using it are as shown in Appendix 3., ④ City ·Delegation and transfer matters regarding the processing of business by the Provincial Committee shall be determined by the city/provincial committee chairperson, but if not otherwise specified, the Corporation's delegation and transfer rules shall apply mutatis mutandis for smooth business processing.
